page.title: 16REDDISH IN THE NEWS.
page.content: Every year, during the first week of May,{Reddish carnival}takes place. There is a parade of decorated vehicles and people from different clubs around{Reddish.}It usually ends at{Reddish Vale schools}playing fields where there is a fair. There are plans to move the clock in {Holdsworth Square,}to pedestrianise the square and to clean it up. John Lowe, the darts superstar, came to Reddish Leisure Centre to give an exhibition match. { Reddish Vale school}recently performed{"Gregory's Girl"}and a photograph of the cast went in the paper. Three scouts from 3rd Reddish group received awards.
